description: This Java class contains manual mapping methods between domain entities (User, Driver, Booking, Vehicle) and their corresponding Data Transfer Objects (DTOs). It provides static methods for converting entities into response DTOs and creating a Vehicle entity from a driver creation request.

classes.name: Mappers
classes.description: A utility class that provides static methods for converting between entity objects and their corresponding DTOs for responses and creation requests.

methods.name: toUserResponse
methods.description: Converts a User entity into a User response DTO, mapping id, name, and email fields.

methods.name: toDriverResponse
methods.description: Converts a Driver entity into a Driver response DTO, including vehicle details if available.

methods.name: toBookingResponse
methods.description: Converts a Booking entity into a Booking response DTO, including associated user and driver ids.

methods.name: fromCreateDriver
methods.description: Creates a Vehicle entity from a DriverCreateDriverRequest DTO, setting make, model, and plate number.
